# Presentations

```{r}
#| label: talks
# just from 2019
# then provide a list of other places I have spoken
# provide some text of this, detail the countries/events I've spoken at.
# make the talk in bold, add the speaker type in brackets after title
talks |> 
  filter(year(when) >= 2018) |> 
  mutate(why = as.character(why),
         what = toTitleCase(what)) |> 
  detailed_entries(what = glue("{with} ({why})"), 
                   when = when, 
                   with = what, 
                   where = where)
```

I have been an Associate Editor for the R Journal since 2021, served on the organising committee of UseR! in 2018, and was founding and principal organiser of the annual rOpenSci Ozunconference, from 2016 - 2018. I have been the organising chair of two university research groups, the Nonâ€Uniform Monash Business Analytics Team (NUMBAT) group at Monash, and the Bayesian Research and Applications Group (BRAG) at Queensland University of Technology.
